src.execution.main_executor

Module Contents

Classes

MainExecutor

Main executor class that defines execution blocks to perform complex tasks using partial stages
class src.execution.main_executor.MainExecutor(display)

Bases: src.execution.base_executor.BaseExecutor

Main executor class that defines execution blocks to perform complex tasks using partial stages from parent BaseExecutor class.

execute_data_analysis(self)

Execute data preparation and data analysis stage.

execute_full_flow(self, architecture, epochs, loss_function, metrics, save_model, batch_size, optimizers, activations, plot_probability=True)

Execute all stages. Prepare load train, test and validation data into memory, initialize convolutional neural network with given architecture, train and test the network. Save the model locally.

Parameters

  • architecture – str network architecture name

  • epochs – int number of network training iterations

  • loss_function – tf loss function to be used for network compilation

  • metrics – list of metrics to be measured for network

  • save_model – bool defining if output model should be saved

  • plot_probability – bool to define if class probability heatmap should be displayed

  • batch_size – batch size

  • optimizers – dict of optimizers and learning rates to be used

  • activations – list of layer activation functions

execute_test_networks(self, networks_to_test=[], plot_probability=True)

Execute test networks stage. Test all networks saved in app default dir.

Parameters

  • networks_to_test – list of networks to be tested, if empty list is provided, test all saved networks

  • plot_probability – bool to define if class probability heatmap should be displayed

execute_analyze_networks(self, nn_dir)

Execute analyze networks stage. Analyze all networks saved in app default dir.

execute_analyze_single_network(self, network_name, layer_num, image_path)

Execute analyze given network stage.

Parameters

  • network_name – str network name to be analyzed

  • layer_num – int number of layer to be analyzed

  • image_path – str path to image to analyze kernels and feature map

execute_land_use_classification_use_case(self, sat_img_list, network_name)

Execute land use classification use case stage. Load satellite image, split it into tiles and perform classification with given network on each tile. Further, land use classification map is generated based on networks’ predictions.

Parameters

  • sat_img_list – list of str names of satellite images to be used

  • network_name – str name of network to be used for land use classification on given sat image

execute_nn_hyper_parameters_tuning(self, overwrite, max_trials, executions_per_trial, n_epoch_search, save_model)

Execute neural network hyper parameters tuning stage.

Parameters

  • overwrite – bool, overwrite existing tuner

  • max_trials – int, num of max trials for tuning

  • executions_per_trial – int, num of executions per trial

  • n_epoch_search – int, num of epochs to perform search

  • save_model – bool, if output nn model shall be saved
